Instruction: Combine vegetable oil and flour in a microwave-safe glass bowl, whisking until smooth.

Whisk flour into the vegetable oil in a microwave-safe glass bowl until smooth. Microwave at 70% power for 6 minutes to create a white roux. For a darker roux, stir and return to the microwave. Continue cooking at 70% power in 2 to 3 minute intervals until the desired color is achieved.
